topOpportunities.title: Eliminate render-blocking resources
topOpportunities.description: Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).

topOpportunities.title: Reduce unused JavaScript
topOpportunities.description: Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).

topOpportunities.title: Reduce unused CSS
topOpportunities.description: Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-css-rules/).

topOpportunities.title: Minify CSS
topOpportunities.description: Minifying CSS files can reduce network payload sizes. [Learn how to minify CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-css/).

topOpportunities.title: Minify JavaScript
topOpportunities.description: Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).

recommendations.title: Performance Optimization
recommendations.description: Focus on Core Web Vitals and bundle optimization
actions: Implement code splitting and lazy loading

recommendations.title: Bundle Optimization
recommendations.description: Reduce bundle size and eliminate unused code
actions: Use dynamic imports for large dependencies
